spoiler.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a raised part on a racing car that prevents the car from lifting off the road at high speeds
spoiler.translation[0].definitions[1].de: part of an aircraft wing that can be lifted up to slow the plane down
spoiler.translation[0].definitions[2].de: someone or something that prevents another person or thing from being successful
spoiler.translation[0].definitions[3].de: a person or team that spoils anotherâ€™s winning record
spoiler.translation[0].definitions[4].de: a message or report that is intended to ruin the surprising part of a popular film, book etc by telling people about the surprise before they see or read it
